name: insection
description: A data structure for storing number intervals

scripts.lint: jshint lib && jshint test && jscs lib && jscs test
scripts.travis: npm test && npm run coverage && <coverage/lcov.info coveralls
scripts.prepublish: (echo '/*!' && <LICENSE sed -e's/^/ * /' | sed -e's/\s+$//' && echo ' */' && browserify -p bundle-collapser/plugin -e lib/Insection -s com.one.insection) > insection.js

author: Sune Simonsen <sss@one.com>
